node.title: Russian Embassy in NZ posts footage appearing to show alleged arson attempt
node.description: The Russian Embassy in New Zealand has published a video appearing to show an alleged arson attempt on its Karori building in Wellington.
node.content:
["The Russian Embassy in New Zealand has published a video appearing to show an alleged arson attempt on its Karori building in Wellington.", "", "
The Russian Embassy in Wellington posted this clip on its facebook page, which appears to show a fire near its building. Photo: Russian Embassy / Facebook
", "The video, posted earlier today on their facebook page, but dated 12 March, captures footage of a person throwing a burning object over the fence.", "Another clip of the published video - this time of more footage playing via another screen - appears to show inside the gated area near the building, where a bright object lands, the screen goes white and then a fire is visible.", "The video is captioned "stop hating Russians" and also says threats to the embassy were received via phone a few days prior.", "Police were unable to confirm this evening if they were investigating", "The embassy has been approached for comment.", "Last month, Ukrainians and their supporters peacefully protested against the Russian invasion outside the Karori embassy."]
